That defeat the purposes of ZeroNet - The right of Free speech is availlable to any Zero Net Users. 
Everyone have different views and opinions - You aren't to decide what's right and wrong. There could be someone right now having the same idea to suppress your speech because he have different ideal. Now, You wouldn't want to be blocked, Right?
